info.title: AzureDigitalTwinsManagementClient
info.description: Azure Digital Twins Client for managing DigitalTwinsInstance

200.description: The body contains all the non-security properties of the DigitalTwinsInstance. Security-related properties are set to null.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Create or update the metadata of a DigitalTwinsInstance. The usual pattern to modify a property is to retrieve the DigitalTwinsInstance and security metadata, and then combine them with the modified values in a new body to update the DigitalTwinsInstance.

200.description: This is returned as a response when the resource already exists and was updated successfully.

201.description: Created - Put request accepted; the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: This is returned as a response to the status polling request for the create or update operation. The body contains the resource representation that indicates a transitional provisioning state.

202.description: Accepted - Patch request accepted; the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Returned if the operation was canceled or failed.

202.description: Accepted - Delete request accepted; the operation will complete asynchronously.

204.description: Returned when the long running delete operation has finished, or the Digital Twins instance does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: The body contains all the non-security properties of the DigitalTwinsInstance. Security-related properties are set to null.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: The body contains all the non-security properties of the DigitalTwinsInstance. Security-related properties are set to null.

parameters.name: endpointDescription
parameters.description: The DigitalTwinsInstance endpoint metadata and security metadata.

200.description: This is returned as a response to the status polling request for the create or update operation. The body contains the resource representation that indicates a transitional provisioning state.

201.description: Created - Put request accepted; the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Returned if the operation was canceled or failed.

202.description: Accepted - Delete request accepted; the operation will complete asynchronously.

204.description: Returned when the long running delete operation has finished, or the egress endpoint does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get all the DigitalTwinsInstances in a subscription.

200.description: This is a synchronous operation. The body contains a JSON-serialized array of the metadata from all the DigitalTwinsInstances in the subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get all the DigitalTwinsInstances in a resource group.

200.description: This is a synchronous operation. The body contains a JSON-serialized array of the metadata from all the DigitalTwinsInstances in the resource group. If more data is available, the body will contain a link to the next page of items (nextLink).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the available DigitalTwins service REST API operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Check if a DigitalTwinsInstance name is available.

parameters.name: digitalTwinsInstanceCheckName
parameters.description: Set the name parameter in the DigitalTwinsInstanceCheckName structure to the name of the DigitalTwinsInstance to check.

200.description: This is a synchronous operation. The body contains a JSON-serialized response that specifies whether the DigitalTwins service name is available. If the name is not available, the body contains the reason.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List private link resources for given Digital Twin.

200.description: The body contains the list of private link resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the specified private link resource for the given Digital Twin.

200.description: The body contains the specified of private link resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: The body contains the list of private endpoint connection properties.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get private endpoint connection properties for the given private endpoint.

200.description: The body contains the private endpoint connection properties.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Delete private endpoint connection with the specified name.

202.description: This is a long running operation. The operation returns a 202 if the validation is complete. The response includes an Azure-AsyncOperation header that contains a status URL. Clients are expected to poll the status URL for the status of the operation.

204.description: Returned when the long running delete operation has finished, or the private endpoint does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Update the status of a private endpoint connection with the given name.

parameters.name: privateEndpointConnection
parameters.description: The private endpoint connection with updated properties.

201.description: This is a long running operation. The operation returns a 201 if the validation is complete. The response includes an Azure-AsyncOperation header that contains a status URL. Clients are expected to poll the status URL for the status of the operation. If successful, the operation returns HTTP status code of 200 (OK).

200.description: This is returned as a response when the resource already exists and was updated successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

hostName.description: Api endpoint to work with DigitalTwinsInstance.

DigitalTwinsDescription.description: The description of the DigitalTwins service.

DigitalTwinsPatchDescription.description: The description of the DigitalTwins service.

identity.description: The managed identity for the DigitalTwinsInstance.

DigitalTwinsResource.description: The common properties of a DigitalTwinsInstance.

identity.description: The managed identity for the DigitalTwinsInstance.

DigitalTwinsIdentity.description: The managed identity for the DigitalTwinsInstance.

type.description: The type of Managed Identity used by the DigitalTwinsInstance. Only SystemAssigned is supported.

principalId.description: The object id of the Managed Identity Resource. This will be sent to the RP from ARM via the x-ms-identity-principal-id header in the PUT request if the resource has a systemAssigned(implicit) identity

tenantId.description: The tenant id of the Managed Identity Resource. This will be sent to the RP from ARM via the x-ms-client-tenant-id header in the PUT request if the resource has a systemAssigned(implicit) identity

code.description: Service specific error code which serves as the substatus for the HTTP error code.

DigitalTwinsDescriptionListResult.description: A list of DigitalTwins description objects with a next link.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of DigitalTwins description objects.

value.description: A list of DigitalTwins description objects.

OperationListResult.description: A list of DigitalTwins service operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of DigitalTwins description objects.

value.description: A list of DigitalTwins operations supported by the Microsoft.DigitalTwins resource provider.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation.

isDataAction.description: If the operation is a data action (for data plane rbac).

OperationDisplay.description: The object that represents the operation.

type.description: The type of resource, for instance Microsoft.DigitalTwins/digitalTwinsInstances.

CheckNameRequest.description: The result returned from a database check name availability request.

nameAvailable.description: Specifies a Boolean value that indicates if the name is available.

message.description: Message indicating an unavailable name due to a conflict, or a description of the naming rules that are violated.

reason.description: Message providing the reason why the given name is invalid.

CheckNameResult.description: The result returned from a check name availability request.

DigitalTwinsEndpointResourceProperties.description: Properties related to Digital Twins Endpoint

endpointType.description: The type of Digital Twins endpoint

createdTime.description: Time when the Endpoint was added to DigitalTwinsInstance.

authenticationType.description: Specifies the authentication type being used for connecting to the endpoint.

DigitalTwinsEndpointResourcePropertiesWi.description: Properties related to Digital Twins Endpoint with key-based authentication.

deadLetterSecret.description: Dead letter storage secret for key-based authentication. Will be obfuscated during read.

DigitalTwinsEndpointResourcePropertiesWi.description: Properties related to Digital Twins Endpoint with identity-based authentication.

deadLetterUri.description: Dead letter storage URL for identity-based authentication.

ServiceBus.description: Properties related to ServiceBus with key-based authentication.

primaryConnectionString.description: PrimaryConnectionString of the endpoint. Will be obfuscated during read.

secondaryConnectionString.description: SecondaryConnectionString of the endpoint. Will be obfuscated during read.

ServiceBusWithIdentity.description: Properties related to ServiceBus with identity-based authentication.

endpointUri.description: The URL of the ServiceBus namespace. It must include the protocol sb://

EventHub.description: Properties related to EventHub with key-based authentication.

connectionStringPrimaryKey.description: PrimaryConnectionString of the endpoint. Will be obfuscated during read.

connectionStringSecondaryKey.description: SecondaryConnectionString of the endpoint. Will be obfuscated during read.

EventHubWithIdentity.description: Properties related to EventHub with identity-based authentication.

endpointUri.description: The URL of the EventHub namespace. It must include the protocol sb://

entityPath.description: The EventHub name in the EventHub namespace

accessKey1.description: EventGrid secondary accesskey. Will be obfuscated during read.

accessKey2.description: EventGrid secondary accesskey. Will be obfuscated during read.

DigitalTwinsEndpointResourceListResult.description: A list of DigitalTwinsInstance Endpoints with a next link.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of DigitalTwinsInstance Endpoints.

GroupIdInformationProperties.description: The properties for a group information object.

requiredMembers.description: The required members for a specific group id.

requiredZoneNames.description: The required DNS zones for a specific group id.

GroupIdInformation.description: The group information for creating a private endpoint on Digital Twin.

GroupIdInformationResponse.description: The available private link resources for a Digital Twin.

value.description: The list of available private link resources for a Digital Twin.

PrivateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: The current state of a private endpoint connection.

status.description: The status of a private endpoint connection.

description.description: The description for the current state of a private endpoint connection.

actionsRequired.description: Actions required for a private endpoint connection.

PrivateEndpoint.description: The private endpoint property of a private endpoint connection.

PrivateEndpointConnectionProperties.description: The properties of a private endpoint connection.

PrivateEndpointConnection.description: The private endpoint connection of a Digital Twin.

api-version.name: api-version
api-version.description: Version of the DigitalTwinsInstance Management API.

resourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName
resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group that contains the DigitalTwinsInstance.

privateEndpointConnectionName.name: privateEndpointConnectionName
privateEndpointConnectionName.description: The name of the private endpoint connection.

resourceId.name: resourceId
resourceId.description: The name of the private link resource.
